name: CyberBall (itch)
description:
Cyberball is a little cyberpunk pinball game where the ball leaves trails behind it. You can use these trails at your advantage!

You can also generate a shockwave by pressing Space: it will pause your momentum, and every trail block near the shockwave will be destroyed, use this to clear the level a bit!

This game created as part of a theme week in our Game Design school is entirely free to play

Credits

Anna Solydia: Programming

Priam Chhay: 3D Modeling

Matthieu Darmagnac: Sound Design
